text: Sergio Fantoni (7 August 1930 â€“ 17 April 2020) was an Italian actor. He was born in Rome. He was known for his role as Haman in Esther and the King. Fantoni was also known for his television role in The Manageress. Fantoni died on 17 April 2020 in Rome, aged 89. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Actors from Rome
title: Sergio Fantoni
